__e: - Benny Garucci, he really loves this place. He talks about it all the time.
It's a love story. Hardly suitable for children.
- Why do you keep saying suitcase?
Why is it always Gusev? Gusev.
Besides, why are you always taking me out?
Because you're always with me because you can't be alone.
I spend all my time trying to forget you, so I think of you all the time.
And while it was happening, I kept thinking about that patient, and how I wish I was like him.
